item.title: Deep Hedging with Non-Parametric Volatility Surfaces and Explicit Forecasting
item.description: This paper develops a novel deep hedging framework trained on real SPY options data, using autoencoder-compressed volatility surfaces and LSTM forecasting to learn optimal hedging strategies.
